thread.section_title: San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Burlingame, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great spot!
thread.title_full: Great spot! - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Dubbleu
title: Great spot!
text:
This is a great place to stay. The hotel is conveniently located minutes from the airport via a free shuttle. The hotel is recently renovated and the rooms are comfortable with a refrigerator and small coffee maker. Starbucks in the lobby. Early morning sunrise across the bay is spectacular with the shorebirds feeding in the mudflats. Walking path out along the water provides nice access to nearby restaurants. The hotel staff is very friendly and responsive.
